scripts.buildfrontdev3: cargo run-script libwasmdev3 && pnpm install && pnpm -C ./app/allelo webbuild && pnpm -C ./sdk/js/web builddev3 && pnpm -C ./engine/broker/auth build
scripts.buildfront: cargo run-script libwasm && pnpm -C ./app/nextgraph install && pnpm -C ./app/nextgraph webbuild && pnpm -C ./sdk/js/web build && pnpm -C ./engine/broker/auth install && pnpm -C ./engine/broker/auth build
scripts.buildfrontallelo: cargo run-script libwasm && pnpm install && cd app/allelo && pnpm install && pnpm webbuild && cd ../.. && pnpm -C ./sdk/js/web install && pnpm -C ./sdk/js/web build && pnpm -C ./engine/broker/auth install && pnpm -C ./engine/broker/auth build
scripts.buildfrontdev: pnpm -C ./engine/broker/auth builddev && pnpm -C ./infra/ngnet/bootstrap builddev && pnpm -C ./infra/ngnet/auth builddev && pnpm -C ./infra/ngnet/redir builddev && pnpm -C ./sdk/js/web builddev
